name: The Flock of the Sacred Lamb

deity.name: The Sacred Lamb
deity.description: The Sacred Lamb is a benevolent deity who watches over its followers and guides them towards enlightenment.

rituals.name: The Offering
rituals.description: Followers of the Sacred Lamb offer fruits and vegetables at the altar as a sign of their devotion.

rituals.name: The Pilgrimage
rituals.description: Once a year, followers of the Sacred Lamb undertake a pilgrimage to a sacred site to seek guidance and blessings from their deity.

beliefs: The Sacred Lamb is the one true deity and all others are false.
Through devotion and obedience to the Sacred Lamb, followers can achieve enlightenment and eternal happiness.
All life is sacred and must be treated with respect and compassion.
